text: Shifted to Pasir Ris last year July. Read the review for surround clinic at Elias Mall and decide to try this clinic. Doc Chen very friendly and the price reasonable. Decided K B Tan Clinic will be our family clinic from now onwards

Don't know it is due to past bad reviews, the counter staff seemed to be okay, in fact polite during my visit. Dr Chen is as friendly and warm as his dad. I even learnt two things from him today. Patient and willing to take time to share. One star down cos I think overall fee is a bit ex, not sure is it bcos I long time never visit private doctor and this is the current price tag?

I have been seeing senior Dr Tan for 20 years, and he has witnessed my children growing up. Dr Tan is very kind and honest, caring for his patients. He never asked us to take unnecessary tests, even once advised me no need to spend money as he saw that all was fine. The consultation fee is also very reasonable. He also refer us to specialist who carries the same value. He is just as what the words in this photo describes, a good and kind doctor. Thank you Dr Tan, we are blessed to have you as my family doctor.

I don't know I just feel disappointed..it feels the Dr lack of warmth & empathy..I walked in to the room without being greeted "how are U feeling"," how can I help U"..I have to explain my condition,and he don't asked much question-and consultation ended just in a minute..& no closing of "take care/thank U/get well soon..I just felt  my concern /discomfort was simply dismissed.

Dr Tan has been our family's doctor for many years. Most ethical doctor I have ever seen. He is extremely professional and experienced and always charges reasonably. We feel very assured in his capable hands. He has our gratitude always.
